title: Dill cucumber and avocado salad
ingredients: ['1 cucumber, peeled and thinly sliced', '1 small red onion, thinly sliced', '4-5 tablespoons chopped fresh dill', '1 clove garlic, quartered', '2 tablespoons caster sugar', '1 teaspoon salt', '1 ripe avocado, peeled, pitted and chopped', '4 tablespoons red wine vinegar']
